com.stormpath.sdk.authc.BasicAuthenticationOptions

  • Packages that use BasicAuthenticationOptions 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.authc  
    com.stormpath.sdk.impl.authc  

    • Uses of BasicAuthenticationOptions in com.stormpath.sdk.authc

      Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.authc with type parameters of type BasicAuthenticationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BasicAuthenticationOptions<T extends BasicAuthenticationOptions>
      BasicAuthentication-specific options that may be specified during authentication.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.authc that return BasicAuthenticationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BasicAuthenticationOptions UsernamePasswordRequests.options()
      Returns a new BasicAuthenticationOptions instance, that may be used to customize the AuthenticationResult resource that will be obtained after a successful authentication.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.authc with parameters of type BasicAuthenticationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.withResponseOptions(BasicAuthenticationOptions options)
      Ensures that when the response is obtained, it will be retrieved with the specified options.
